sentence:

Mr. CARTER of Georgia. Mr. Speaker, I rise today in strong support of  the Shandra Eisenga Human Cell and Tissue Product Safety Act, which is  a critical piece of legislation aimed at preventing tuberculosis  infections linked to tissue transplants.

Mr. Speaker, I rise in support of this bipartisan legislation, H.R.  1082, the Shandra Eisenga Human Cell and Tissue Product Safety Act.
